channel.title: SMITE | Player Owned Shops | 5 Game Modes | Anti-Scam Dicing
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e9q36Lo.png[/img]
With the release of Ruse, a lot of people have been switching sources or have started hosting a RSPS because of it. I am no exception, I do not doubt it. But; I am planning to change things before I host it. I guess that's what makes me different. I wanted to create this thread to keep you all updated as to what I add/change so that (in the future) if someone asks what I have changed; I would just redirect them to this thread. Ruse already has a lot of things added & it would be hard to make this project more unique than all the other "Ruse Leech"s. Despite that fact; I still want to try and see where I can take this project to. I don't expect people to follow this Project as I am just doing this for the enjoyment of it. [URL=http://"http://www.SmitePs.com/"] Website/Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/4nqmm11binxolfg/SMITE.jar"]Download[/URL] |[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/617495-smite-player-owned-shops-many-customs-items-npcs-minigames-interfaces.html"] Project Thread[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://smiteps.com/index.php?/topic/17-giveaway-1/"]Giveaway #1[/URL]
[b]Key:[/b] Green: Done Orange: In Progress Red: Not Started Yet
[SPOILER=Ruse Features]- Many Client Settings Frames Toggling, Old/New hits Toggling, x10 Hits/HP Toggling, Smilies, Cursors/Censors/Tooltips, HD Textures Toggling, Fog, Resizable & Fullscreen - Very Informational Player Panel - 100+ Achievements - All skills working except Construction - Tons of Bosses - Tons of Minigames - Custom Questions - Great Pking - Game Modes Normal, Ironman, Hardcore Ironman - Server Tour - Well of Good Will - Shooting Star - Bank Tabs & Search - Bounty Hunter - In Game High-Scores - New Prayers (Curses, etc) - 100% Clanchat system with ranks - Many More[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=My Features]- Completionist Cape Recoloring - Working Construction Skill - Custom Minigames - More Quests - Better Pk Rewards - Some Custom Items/NPC's - Player Owned Shops System - Drop Party System - Custom Loyalty Title Interface - Scam Free Dicing System - Many Bug Fixes [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Progress] 17/01/2016: - Fixed Summoning Bugs - Fixed Barrage/Gmaul Abuse Bugs - Fixed Freeze Spells Bugs - Fixed Multi Spells Bugs - Fixed combat Bugs - Fixed Duel Arena Bugs - Fixed Clan Chat Bugs - Fixed Pet Bugs - Fixed Dungeoneering Smuggling Bug - Removed the GE
21/01/2016: - Added Player Owned Shops System - Added Drop Party System at Party Room - Login Screen & BG Has been changed
23/01/2016: Added the following customs: - Full Serenic Armor - Crystal Items (Bow, Staff, Halberd, Shield) - Tri Scythe (Misc item for starters) - Bandos Blade (Will be added to Bandos Boss - Draconic Shield (Will be dropped by monsters in the Wildy)
24/01/2016 - Edited the Loyalty Title Interface
25/01/2016 - Added 5 Custom Sets (Check Media)
27/01/2016 - Added Iron Man & Hardcore Iron Man Armor/Cape's (Check Media) - Added "Choose your Game Mode" Interface (Check Media)
29/01/2016 - Started working on the forums ([url=http://www.smiteps.com]Forums - Smite[/url]) (CheckMedia) - Reworked on the starting tutorial - Added Store to Forums (Not automatic yet)
2/02/2016 - Finished on Anti-Scam Dicing System (check media)
[/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VL2UQzC.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wVC8wAm.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Customs Armor][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uk3E80v.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WQZh7wa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/syWjGnu.png[/img][/SPOILER]

Sky for his client services
Ziva for his custom models [/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.title: SMITE | Player Owned Shops | 5 Game Modes | Anti-Scam Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Nice looking website, but why ‘Smite’? That’s already taken by a big company. Technically speaking, it’s illegal to use that name (could be wrong I suppose). I realize you probably named it after the prayer but still…

Read full topic
item.source: SMITE | Player Owned Shops | 5 Game Modes | Anti-Scam Dicing

item.title: SMITE | Player Owned Shops | 5 Game Modes | Anti-Scam Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Aj_Williams Aj Williams
item.description:
@Aj_Williams wrote:

[CENTER]

e9q36Lo.png905×259

With the release of Ruse, a lot of people have been switching sources or have started hosting a RSPS because of it. I am no exception, I do not doubt it. But; I am planning to change things before I host it. I guess that’s what makes me different. I wanted to create this thread to keep you all updated as to what I add/change so that (in the future) if someone asks what I have changed; I would just redirect them to this thread. Ruse already has a lot of things added & it would be hard to make this project more unique than all the other "Ruse Leech"s. Despite that fact; I still want to try and see where I can take this project to. I don’t expect people to follow this Project as I am just doing this for the enjoyment of it.

Website/Forums | Download | Project Thread | Giveaway #1

Key:
Green: Done
Orange: In Progress
Red: Not Started Yet

[SPOILER=Ruse Features]- Many Client Settings
Frames Toggling, Old/New hits Toggling, x10 Hits/HP Toggling, Smilies, Cursors/Censors/Tooltips, HD Textures Toggling, Fog, Resizable & Fullscreen

  • Very Informational Player Panel
  • 100+ Achievements
  • All skills working except Construction
  • Tons of Bosses
  • Tons of Minigames
  • Custom Questions
  • Great Pking
  • Game Modes
    Normal, Ironman, Hardcore Ironman
  • Server Tour
  • Well of Good Will
  • Shooting Star
  • Bank Tabs & Search
  • Bounty Hunter
  • In Game High-Scores
  • New Prayers (Curses, etc)
  • 100% Clanchat system with ranks
  • Many More[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=My Features]- Completionist Cape Recoloring

  • Working Construction Skill
  • Custom Minigames
  • More Quests
  • Better Pk Rewards
  • Some Custom Items/NPC’s
  • Player Owned Shops System
  • Drop Party System
  • Custom Loyalty Title Interface
  • Scam Free Dicing System
  • Many Bug Fixes
    [/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Progress]
17/01/2016:

  • Fixed Summoning Bugs
  • Fixed Barrage/Gmaul Abuse Bugs
  • Fixed Freeze Spells Bugs
  • Fixed Multi Spells Bugs
  • Fixed combat Bugs
  • Fixed Duel Arena Bugs
  • Fixed Clan Chat Bugs
  • Fixed Pet Bugs
  • Fixed Dungeoneering Smuggling Bug
  • Removed the GE

21/01/2016:

  • Added Player Owned Shops System
  • Added Drop Party System at Party Room
  • Login Screen & BG Has been changed

23/01/2016:
Added the following customs:

  • Full Serenic Armor
  • Crystal Items (Bow, Staff, Halberd, Shield)
  • Tri Scythe (Misc item for starters)
  • Bandos Blade (Will be added to Bandos Boss
  • Draconic Shield (Will be dropped by monsters in the Wildy)

24/01/2016

  • Edited the Loyalty Title Interface

25/01/2016

  • Added 5 Custom Sets (Check Media)

27/01/2016

  • Added Iron Man & Hardcore Iron Man Armor/Cape’s (Check Media)
  • Added “Choose your Game Mode” Interface (Check Media)

29/01/2016

  • Started working on the forums (Forums - Smite) (CheckMedia)
  • Reworked on the starting tutorial
  • Added Store to Forums (Not automatic yet)

2/02/2016

  • Finished on Anti-Scam Dicing System (check media)
